attributes.action: Remove the word 'insulting' from Section 5 of the public order act 1986
attributes.additional_details: Feeling “insulted” should never constitute a crime by itself. Therefore, we the undersigned petition the government to remove the word "insulting" from Section 5.
attributes.background: Protect Freedom of speech by removing the word "insulting" from section 5 of the Public Order Act 1986

rejection.details:
The word 'insulting' was removed in 2013

You can read the current text of the Act here

https://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/1986/64/section/5
